description: This file defines a set of reusable UI card components for a React application, including Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardDescription, CardContent, and CardFooter. Each component uses React's forwardRef for ref forwarding and utility functions for className management.

methods.name: Card
methods.description: Main card container component with styling and ref forwarding.

methods.name: CardHeader
methods.description: Component for the header section of the card.

methods.name: CardTitle
methods.description: Component for the card's title text.

methods.name: CardDescription
methods.description: Component for the card's description text.

methods.name: CardContent
methods.description: Component for the main content area of the card.

methods.name: CardFooter
methods.description: Component for the footer section of the card.
